Hyperliquid (HYPE) พุ่งสูงขึ้น 50% ใน 2 สัปดาห์: สามารถปั๊มเพิ่มได้อีกหรือไม่?

Hyperliquid (HYPE) Soars by 50% in 2 Weeks: Can It Pump Even More?

1d ago//Dimitar Dzhondzhorov
general
AI

Summary

TH

แม้ว่าตลาดคริปโตโดยรวมจะอยู่ในภาวะตกต่ำโดยส่งผลกระทบต่อสินทรัพย์หลักอย่าง Bitcoin และ Ethereum แต่ Hyperliquid (HYPE) กลับพุ่งขึ้น 50% ในรอบสองสัปดาห์โดยปัจจุบันเทรดอยู่ที่ราว 32 ดอลลาร์ แรงขับเคลื่อนเชิงบวกนี้มาจากการพัฒนาต่างๆ เช่น Ripple Prime ที่เปิดรองรับแพลตฟอร์ม และ Grayscale ที่สังเกตเห็นความสนใจที่เพิ่มขึ้นใน perpetual futures สำหรับสินทรัพย์ที่ไม่ใช่คริปโต นอกจากนี้ข้อมูล on-chain ยังแสดงให้เห็นการเติบโตสูงสุดใหม่โดยมี Open Interest อยู่ที่ 1 พันล้านดอลลาร์และปริมาณการเทรดรายวันถึง 4.8 พันล้านดอลลาร์ แม้ว่านักวิเคราะห์อย่าง Crypto General และ Zach จะมองโลกในแง่ดีและคาดการณ์ว่าราคาโทเคนอาจทะลุ 100 ดอลลาร์จากการเพิ่มขึ้นของส่วนแบ่งตลาดและการ buyback แต่ก็มีผู้เตือนว่าสภาพตลาดขาลงอาจดึงราคาลงมาที่ 20 ดอลลาร์ได้ในท้ายที่สุด

EN

Despite the broader crypto market slump affecting major assets like Bitcoin and Ethereum, Hyperliquid (HYPE) has surged by 50% over the last two weeks, trading around $32. This positive momentum is driven by developments such as Ripple Prime adding support for the platform and Grayscale noting increased interest in perpetual futures for non-crypto assets. Additionally, on-chain data shows record growth with open interest hitting $1 billion and daily volume reaching $4.8 billion. While analysts like Crypto General and Zach remain bullish, predicting the token could exceed $100 due to rising market share and buybacks, others warn that bearish market conditions could eventually drag the price down to $20.

Key Points

  • Hyperliquid (HYPE) bucked the market trend with a 50% gain in two weeks.
  • Key drivers include Ripple Prime integration and record-high on-chain volume metrics.
  • Analyst predictions vary, with price targets ranging from a drop to $20 or a surge above $100.

Article

Will HYPE continue its uptrend or will it follow the broader market downtrend? It’s quite difficult to spot a popular cryptocurrency whose price hasn’t tumbled by 20% or even more in the last few weeks. Hyperliquid (HYPE), though, is an evident exception, and its solid performance has caused analysts to envision further gains in the near future. The Lone Survivor Bitcoin (BTC) has crashed to a 14-month low of around $69,000, Ethereum (ETH) is struggling to keep the $2,000 level, while Ripple’s XRP and Solana (SOL) have plummeted by 27% in the past seven days. However, Hyperliquid (HYPE) has somehow defied the ongoing massacre and currently trades at around $32, representing a 50% increase on a two-week scale. HYPE Price, Source: CoinGecko Its strong performance comes amid a string of positive developments surrounding the ecosystem. Earlier this week, Ripple announced that its institutional prime brokerage platform (called Ripple Prime) enabled support for Hyperliquid. Meanwhile, Grayscale recently revealed that it was encouraged by the rise in perpetual futures trading for non-crypto assets on the decentralized exchange. Before that, on-chain data revealed growing interest in HIP-3 activity amid skyrocketing trading volume and open interest. These metrics continued to increase as the market tumbled in the past few days, reaching new peaks of $1B in OI and $4.8B in 24-hour volume. HYPE has been the subject of numerous optimistic predictions, and many analysts believe there’s fuel left for additional gains. The analyst , using the X moniker Crypto General, expects volatility ahead and an eventual explosion above $100 later this year. Speaking on the matter was also Zach, who argued there are “so many reasons to buy and hold HYPE.” There are so many reasons to buy and hold $HYPE . The more it takes over market share and volume, the bigger the buybacks are, which is one of the reasons it’s so strong. Really would love to get a spot entry around yearly open of $25 but who knows if it’ll come — Zach (@CryptoZachLA) February 4, 2026 You may also like: Ripple Announces Institutional Support for Hyperliquid These Popular Altcoins Lost the Most in the Last 24 Hours: What You Need to Know Hyperliquid Confirms Former Employee Behind HYPE Shorting Activity The popular analyst Crypto Tony chipped in, too, suggesting that HYPE could do “magical things when the market conditions are right.” Those interested in additional bullish forecasts for the token can read our dedicated article here . Can It Follow the Pack? It is important to note that the broader crypto market remains shaky, and sustained bearish conditions could eventually weigh in on HYPE as well. Some analysts believe this is a likely outcome. The one using the X handle, Greeny, predicted that the native token of Hyperliquid could plummet to $20 later in 2026.
